name: Jurassic Hunt 3D. Best Dinosaur Hunting World Simulator
name_original: Jurassic Hunt 3D. Best Dinosaur Hunting World Simulator
description:
Download to PLAY your new game JURASSIC HUNT 3D in ACTION category on the App Store now!

A new challenge game of shooting you dont want to miss! Go back to the Jurassic age and hunt down the dinosaurs. FEEL the real 3D environments and HD game play on the App Store. Zoom in and shoot your target, you are dead if you miss it! Unlock new achievements and tasks after every level. Explore the new worlds & missions.

Download & enjoy the exciting levels of dinosaur hunter game now!

GAME FEATURES:-

*100% FREE game. (Except no ADS version)
*Different dinosaurs to shoot.
*NEW Realistic physics to feel the shooting game.
*Real 3D environments, with zoom in camera views.
*Smooth HD controls, sound & background music.
*Explore different worlds & new hunter missions.
*Game Centre now integrated for leader boards and achievements.
*UNLOCK new achievements to challenge your friends on leader board.
*Share on Facebook

How to Play:-

Tap your phone/tablet on your right side to zoom in and SHOOT.
Check out our free games previews, game trailers, videos and more free apps in the future.

This game is suitable for all kind of genres from kids, girls and boys of all ages.

Install and Play your new game JURASSIC HUNT 3D for free on the App Store now!

If you have any problem in installation, please report to us instead of giving negative comments. We will try to fix it as soon as possible.
To get new updates of Timuz games, Please subscribe us on facebook, Youtube and Twitter!
